record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, JANUARY 31, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, JANUARY 31, 2008 -- (Senate - January 30, 2008)

[Page: S502]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business, it adjourn until 11 a.m. tomorrow, Thursday, January 31, and that following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that the majority leader be recognized.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
